data.title: Compare College Prep at Bakersfield Area Public High Schools
data.meta_description: Compare college prep at Bakersfield Area public high schools based on SAT/ACT scores, graduation rates, and popular colleges.
data.text:

Featured Review: Junior says Overall, my experience with Stockdale High School has been pretty good in my three years here. Academic wise, there are very good classes with teachers that are very determined to teach their... .

Kern High School District, CA ,

Featured Review: Senior says Liberty High School, as biased as I may be, is definitely one of the best schools in Bakersfield. The school spirit is intoxicating, as we sport our country's colors of red, white, and blue, as we... Obviously, AP courses are major GPA boosters, on a surface level. Beyond that, however, they serve as tools to not only prepare students for college, but to provide them with the opportunity to gain... This limits the opportunity to stand out in college with a multitude of rigorous courses, and also makes students less prepared for college. I would like to see this change in the future. .
